name: New York - Marvel Style Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is the Kingpin of Crime in New York City ?
questions.explanation:
Wilson Fisk.

	The Kingpin's mass was achived not by fat, but by muscle. he is able to press over 650 lbs. and is skilled in numerous fighting styles allowing him to be more than a match for superpowered heroes like Daredevil and Spider-Man.

questions.text: When Daredevil is not chasing villians, What is his alter-ego's job ?
questions.explanation:
Lawyer.

	Matt Murdock attended Columbia University with law student Franklin 'Foggy' Nelson, who would become Matt's lifelong friend and partner in his law practice.

questions.text: Peter Parker - Freelance photographer for which New York Paper?
questions.explanation:
Daily Bugle.

	Peter joined the Bugle when he was still at high school, quickly earning himself a reputation for getting photos of Spider-man. I wonder why!!

questions.text: Who donated the mansion that the Avengers call home ?
questions.explanation:
Anthony Stark.

	Stark donated the mansion to the Avengers for their exclusive use, and set up a foundation to cover all the operational expenses of all the nonprofit team of adventurers. This foundation was set up under Stark's mother's name (The Maria Stark Foundation) so that his own business fortunes could not immediately affect the financial situation of the Avengers.

questions.text: Which Character is a member of the X-men as well as the Avengers ?
questions.explanation:
Beast.

	Henry McCoy aka Beast has been a member of several teams and at present is a regular in the X-men line-up as well as a Reserve Avenger.

questions.text: Who were the HellFire's Club main adversaries ?
questions.explanation:
X-Men.

	Hellfire Club, an elite social organization of the world's wealthy and powerful figures. The Inner Circle secretly conspired to achieve world domination through economic and political means.

questions.text: Eddie Brock once worked for the same paper as Peter Parker until he was sacked. Much later he would make headline news as what supervillian ?
questions.explanation:
Venom.

	Losing his job as a reporter drove Brock to consider killing himself. Praying to be forgiven for his suicidal thoughts, Brock's expression of fierce emotion attracted the empathic symbiote and thus merging to become Venom.

questions.text: Several battles have occurred in New York between Heroes and Villains, one of biggest was in Central Park against Onslaught. Which hero was split apart from his alter-ego ?
questions.explanation:
Hulk.

	Hulk battled Onslaught hand-to-hand, tearing apart Onslaught's armor, resulting in an explosion of psionic energy. The explosion separated Banner and the Hulk.

questions.text: Another Famous Team lives in New York City alongide the Avengers, who are they ?
questions.explanation:
The Fantastic Four.

	Reed Richards, Sue Richards, Benjamin Grimm, and Johnny Storm. They lifted off in an experimental starship to become the first humans to attempt interstellar travel. But a freak encounter with cosmic rays changed them -- granting each unique powers.

questions.text: Who looks after the Avenger's Mansion when the team are away ?
questions.explanation:
Edwin Jarvis.

	The Stark family's trusted butler Edwin Jarvis was kept on as the principal regular domestic employee at Avengers Mansion, when Tony Stark donated the mansion to the Avengers.
